009package imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay;
010
011import java.awt.Shape;
012import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
013
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.shape.ShapeProducer;
016
017/** 
018 * Interface specifying the behavior of a 2D triangle.
019 */
020public interface Triangle extends ShapeProducer {
021        
022        /**
023         * Returns an array of points used by the triangulation in the order 
024         * of their insertion.
025         * 
026         * @return an array of points
027         */
028        Pnt2d[] getPoints();
029        
030        @Override
031        public default Shape getShape(double scale) {
032                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
033                Pnt2d[] pts = this.getPoints();
034                Pnt2d a = pts[0];
035                Pnt2d b = pts[1];
036                Pnt2d c = pts[2];
037                path.moveTo(a.getX(), a.getY());
038                path.lineTo(b.getX(), b.getY());
039                path.lineTo(c.getX(), c.getY());
040//              path.lineTo(a.getX(), a.getY());
041                path.closePath();
042                return path;
043        }
044        
045}
046
